title: From Enric Mas to ‘opi-omi’: When the Tour de France goes off the rails in stage 1
content:
Crashes can happen at any time during the Tour de France. They only seem that much more cruel when it happens on the first day.

Read the full article at From Enric Mas to ‘opi-omi’: When the Tour de France goes off the rails in stage 1 on Velo.
author: ahood
